Tengu

{:rpd:images:tengu_sprite.png?200|}

Tengu is a powerful ninja-like boss enemy found in the Prison area of the dungeon. He is known for his extreme difficulty and unique combat mechanics.

Description

Tengu is a mysterious masked figure, possibly the last of his kind, who has become a prison warden of sorts. He is considered one of the most challenging regular bosses in the game due to his unique abilities and combat style. Tengu is an exiled assassin who has made his home in the Prison area of the dungeon.

Stats

  • HP: 120
  • Attack Skill: 20
  • Defense Skill: 20
  • Damage: 8-15
  • Exp for Kill: 20
  • Defense Rate (DR): 5

Combat

  • Health: Very high, requiring sustained effort to defeat
  • Attack: Powerful physical attacks with weapons
  • Abilities:
    • Trap creation and placement
    • Smoke bomb escapes to reset positioning
    • High accuracy and evasion
    • Special ninja techniques
  • Phase Mechanics: Changes tactics during the fight

Special Abilities

  • Assassination Skills: Expert in stealth and quick kills
  • Trap Mastery: Makes extensive use of traps, creating poison traps during combat
  • High Evasion: Difficult to hit consistently
  • Debuff Attacks: Can apply various negative status effects
  • Immunities: Resistant to Toxic Gas and Poison effects

Special Mechanics

  • Smoke Bombs: Periodically teleports (jumps) to reset distance, with a 5-turn cooldown between jumps
  • Trap Creation: Creates 4 poison traps randomly on the level during each teleport phase
  • Self-Healing: When unable to jump to a valid position, heals 10% of max HP
  • Ninja Techniques: Uses various ninja-based special attacks
  • Phase Transition: Becomes more dangerous as health decreases
  • Ballistica Attack: Can attack from a distance using Ballistica line-of-sight calculation

Location

  • Found in the Prison area (level 10)
  • Appears in the boss arena specially designed for this encounter

Preparation

  • Equipment: Strong weapons and armor are essential
  • Consumables: Bring plenty of healing items and utilities
  • Strategy: Plan for a long, complex fight
  • Positioning: Expect to have positioning reset by smoke bombs

Tactics

  • Maintain consistent damage output despite teleportation
  • Avoid standing on floor traps when possible
  • Be prepared for special attacks and mechanics
  • Expect the fight to take many turns
  • Bring ranged options in case of difficult positioning

Rewards

  • Tome of Mastery: If not yet acquired and the player is not a Necromancer or Gnoll
  • Tengu Liver: For Gnoll class players specifically
  • Skeleton Key: Unlocks the Demon Halls area
  • Access to the next dungeon area (Caves)
  • Valuable experience (20 EXP) and treasure

Related

  • Boss Enemies - Other major dungeon challenges
  • Prison - The area where Tengu is found
  • Enemies - Other creatures in the dungeon
  • Combat - General combat mechanics

Notes

Tengu is a unique boss who tests the player's ability to navigate and survive in a trap-filled environment. He's known for his extensive use of traps and debuff attacks.087df4a8853cb3229502316f929e70fc6db6790
